sentence.Network_en: You will not think I have presumed upon your defencelessness - been too quick and unreflecting, will you?
sentence.Network_cn: 你不会觉得我太鲁莽,一点儿也没想一想,趁着你没有防备, 冒犯你了 吧 ?

sentence.Network_en: Habit rules the unreflecting herd ( William Wordsworth ).
sentence.Network_cn: 习惯驱使着没有思想的羊群 ( 威廉华滋华斯 ).

sentence.Network_en: Not choice, but habit rules the unreflecting Wordsworth said in the 19 th century.
sentence.Network_cn: 19世纪,威廉·沃茨沃斯说:“是习惯支配着不思考的群氓, 而不是选择. ”

auth_sentence.content: Taken...by surprise,...she yielded to his embrace with unreflecting inevitableness.
